New Records: Quinton de Kock scored the fastest fifty in the tournament, reaching 50 off 22 balls
Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje defended 13 runs in the final over to secure the victory
Harry Brook's 53 was the highest score for England
Kagiso Rabada and Marco Jansen's bowling performances were crucial
Jos Buttler's incredible fielding and catches were game-changing moments
Pre-Game Insights: England's spinners Moeen Ali and Adil Rashid performed well
Reece Topley conceded only 23 runs in his four overs
Quinton de Kock was crucial to South Africa's chase
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa maintained an unbeaten record in the tournament
England's performance was praised despite the loss
The match was a pivotal moment for South Africa's World Cup campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
South Africa's victory kept their hopes alive in the tournament
The match was played in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia
Others: The match was a thrilling encounter with several dramatic moments
